mapper.select: select A.seq ,A.title , A.writer , to_char(A.wdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') wdate , A.contents , A.hit , A.rnum from ( select A.seq, A.title, A.writer, A.wdate, A.contents,A.hit, row_number() over( order by seq desc) as rnum, ceil(row_number() over( order by seq desc)/10)-1 as pg from tb_board A )A where pg=#{pg}
select A.seq ,A.title ,A.writer ,A.hit ,A.contents ,A.wdate from tb_board A where A.seq = #{seq}
